description: Suspected divisor-or-multiple permutation: a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, a(n) is either the least unitary divisor of a(n-1) not already present, or (if all unitary divisors already used), a(n) = a(n-1) * {the least power of the least prime not dividing a(n-1) such that the term is not already present}.
